description: This file defines a class 'DocxKnowledgeBase' that manages reading and processing DOCX and DOC files, including synchronous and asynchronous methods for loading documents, with support for metadata and directory traversal.

classes.name: DocxKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that extends AgentKnowledge to provide functionality for loading and iterating over DOCX and DOC files, with support for synchronous and asynchronous operations, metadata handling, and directory traversal.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Property that yields lists of Document objects from DOCX/DOC files, handling both list and directory paths, with optional metadata.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator that yields lists of Document objects from DOCX/DOC files, supporting both list and directory paths, with optional metadata.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a document from a specified path, reading its content and processing it with optional metadata, with error handling.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads a document from a specified path, reading its content and processing it with optional metadata, with error handling.

methods.name: _is_valid_docx
methods.description: Helper method to check if a given path points to a valid DOCX or DOC file based on existence, file type, and suffix.
